_comment0_: Tests from the issues discovered in ClearspeakEnglish rules.
name: EnglishClearspeakIssues

Issue_689_4.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis" xml:lang="en"><prosody rate="100%"> <mark name="37"/> the 2 by 2 matrix <break time="750ms"/> <mark name="1"/> Row 1: Column 1, a <break time="500ms"/> <mark name="3"/> Column 2, b <break time="750ms"/> <mark name="30"/> Row 2: Column 1, the 2 by 2 matrix <break time="750ms"/> <mark name="9"/> Row 1: Column 1, <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="7"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">c</say-as> <mark name="8"/> sub 1 <break time="500ms"/> <mark name="13"/> Column 2, <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="11"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">c</say-as> <mark name="12"/> sub 2 <break time="750ms"/> <mark name="18"/> Row 2: Column 1, <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="16"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">c</say-as> <mark name="17"/> sub 3 <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="19"/> plus <mark name="20"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">a</say-as> <mark name="21"/> plus <mark name="22"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">b</say-as> <break time="500ms"/> <mark name="27"/> Column 2, <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="25"/> <say-as interpret-as="character">c</say-as> <mark name="26"/> sub 4 <break time="750ms"/> <mark name="30" kind="LAST"/> end matrix <break time="500ms"/> <mark name="34"/> Column 2, d <break time="750ms"/> <mark name="37" kind="LAST"/> end matrix </prosody></speak>
